S

sendMessage(String, String, BufferedReader, PrintWriter) - Static method in class client.ServerCommunicator
Attempts to send a message from the user to another
sendMessage(String, String, String) - Static method in class server.DatabaseCommunicator
Sends a message from one user to another creating a message in the database
server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
 
Server() - Constructor for class server.Server
 
ServerCommunicator - Class in client
Abstract class containing static methods used for communication with the server It uses a method of communication explained in the ServerThread class Uses the BufferedReader and PrintWriter classes for IO with the server
ServerCommunicator() - Constructor for class client.ServerCommunicator
 
ServerFrame - Class in server
Class containing the window(swing frame) of the server GUI extending the JFrame class It has a set, non-resizable dimension based on screen resolution All of the active elements are contained in the panel object
ServerFrame() - Constructor for class server.ServerFrame
The constructor of the ServerFrame class.
ServerPanel - Class in server
Class containing the panel of the ServerFrame class, extends the JPanel class It contains two tables that show information about the users and messages in the database Contains one "Refresh" button that call the updateData() method that updates the information contained in the tables with the data from the database The top panel contains the JLabels with the table names The bottom panel contains the refresh button The userTable and messageTable panels contain the tables respective to their names The main thing that stands out is the passing of the ServerFrame reference to the constructor and not using the getParen() method
ServerPanel(ServerFrame) - Constructor for class server.ServerPanel
The constructor of the ServerPanel class.
ServerPanel.RefreshAction - Class in server
The inner class for the action listener that listens for actions on the "Refresh" button Implements the ActionListener interface Pressing the button executes a call of the updateData() method
ServerPanel.RefreshAction() - Constructor for class server.ServerPanel.RefreshAction
 
ServerThread - Class in server
ServerThread is the thread class used for handling requests from multiple clients at once It extends the basic class Thread Contains one field that contains the reference to the server socket used
ServerThread(Socket) - Constructor for class server.ServerThread
The constructor of the ServerThread class.
socket - Variable in class server.ServerThread
 
sref - Variable in class client.RegisterLoginPanel
